1.content:
Erin Moriarty slowly blinked her eyes as she woke up. Sitting up the blonde actress sat up on her bed and yawned as she stretched. Erin's pajamas consisted of a black top and and white shorts with criss crossing blue stripes that showed off her legs. Bringing her legs over the side of her bed Erin stood up and out of bed. After another quick stretch she briefly noted the softness of the carpet beneath her bare feet.

         Then Erin began to make her way to her bedroom door. After all the bathroom was on the opposite end of the hallway. It to less than a minute for her to reach the door and pull it open.

         "What the?" Erin gasped. The young woman's house was no longer on the other side of the door. Instead she was looking out at...
1.title: Waking Up

13.content:
Standing in her doorway Erin stared wide eyed at the scenery outside her room. Before the young actress was a beach. To her right was the open sea and to her left was a tropical jungle. Putting two and two together Erin realized that her bedroom somehow now led to a tropical island.

         "This is unexpected," Erin said to herself. The answer to this most likely would not be found in her room, but it was a tropical island so Erin might want to change her clothing before going out and exploring. Erin...
13.title: The Tropical Island

info.brief_description: This The Boys star wakes up to find herself in a world where she is on the menu.
info.description:
Erin Moriarty (26 years old) of The Boys fame woke up one morning only to find that her bedroom door no longer leads to the rest of her house but a strange new world. As Erin explores this new world she soon finds its full of predators and she looks like tasty snack. Unable to return home will Erin survive in this new world or will she just fill a predator's belly?

Erin Moriarty as she appears in this story: https://pics.wikifeet.com/Erin-Moriarty-Feet-2839467.jpg

Rules:
1.) Soft vore is preferred.
2.) Erin is not immune to digestion, so once she is eaten that's it.
3.) Erin must eventually be eaten.
4.) Full tour digestion is allowed.
5.)Choices involving Erin choosing to stay in her room or trying to change clothing before going out must result in a predator barging into her room and eating her.
7.) there is no rule 6.
8.) no Nudity.
9.)Have fun
info.pretty_title: Erin Moriarty and The Vore World
